baUser.description: Represents a user in eTop system. The user may or may not have associated accounts.

op.description:
Can be = ≠ (!=) < ≤ (<=) > ≥ (>=) ⊃ (c) ∈ (in) ∩ (n)

- Text or set: ⊃ ∩
- Exactly: = ≠ ∈
- Numeric: = ≠ ∈ < ≤ > ≥
- Array: = ≠ (only with value is {})

name.description: In `Dép Adidas Adilette Slides - Full Đỏ`, name is "Full Đỏ"

product_name.description: In `Dép Adidas Adilette Slides - Full Đỏ`, product_name is "Dép Adidas Adilette Slides"

excel_compatible_mode.description: For exporting csv compatible with Excel

password.description:
Có thể đổi mật khẩu cho nhân viên, nếu nhân viên đó chưa đổi mật khẩu lần nào.
Tức mật khẩu vẫn đang ở dạng khởi tạo khi vừa mới tạo tài khoản.

allOf.description:
If order_source is self, customer must be shop information
and customer_address, shipping_address must be shop address.

If there are products from shop, this field should be set.
Otherwise, use shop default address.

**Deprecated:** use shipping instead

OrderShipping provides shipping information for an order to be shipped.

If order_source is self, customer must be shop information
and customer_address, shipping_address must be shop address.

If there are products from shop, this field should be set.
Otherwise, use shop default address.

**Deprecated:** use shipping instead

OrderShipping provides shipping information for an order to be shipped.
